article.class: itemscope post_item post_item_single post_featured_default post_format_standard post-1516 page type-page status-publish hentry

div.h1:
DC Bilingual celebrates 15th birthday!
¡DC Bilingual celebra su cumpleaños numero 15!
div.h5: Warm your heart and mind with this video about how DC Bilingual prepares the next generation of global leaders through our inclusive learning community. Alegra tu corazón y mente al ver este video sobre cómo DC Bilingual prepara a la próxima generación de lideres globales a través de una comunidad de aprendizaje inclusiva.

div.class: column-3_5 sc_column_item sc_column_item_1 odd first span_3
sc_slider sc_slider_swiper swiper-slider-container sc_slider_height_fixed sc_slider_controls sc_slider_nopagination
column-2_5 sc_column_item sc_column_item_4 even span_2 after_span_3

div.p: DC Bilingual implements an innovative dual immersion Spanish and English learning program for all students, regardless of home language. Through our rigorous academic curriculum; our comprehensive arts, technology, and athletics offerings; and our celebration of diverse cultures, DC Bilingual’s students learn the skills and values they need to become global leaders.

p.span: DC Bilingual opens its doors to all who wish to grow, learn and lead. We have many ways for community members to become a part of our family. We welcome contributions that continue supporting the dreams and aspirations of our children and families.

a.class: sc_button sc_button_square sc_button_style_filled sc_button_bg_link sc_button_size_medium aligncenter

div.class: column-3_12 sc_column_item sc_column_item_1 odd first span_3

div.p: The latest news and headlines from DC Bilingual

a.title: The Middle States Association announces DC Bilingual’s Accreditation for another seven years!
The Middle States Association announces DC Bilingual’s Accreditation for another seven years!

div.h4: The Middle States Association announces DC Bilingual’s Accreditation for another seven years!

div.p: Date: 10/17/19 The Middle States Association announces DC Bilingual’s Accreditation – the Gold Standard for Measuring and Advancing School Improvement We are excited to share that after an 18-month, rigorous process, the Middle States Association Commissions on Elementary and Secondary Schools (MSA) has reaccredited DC Bilingual for another seven years! Why accreditation? Since 2010, MSA […]

a.class: vc_general vc_btn3 vc_btn3-size-md vc_btn3-shape-rounded vc_btn3-style-flat vc_btn3-color-juicy-pink
a.title: Read more
Access to Schools that Level the Playing Field for DC’s At-Risk Students features DC Bilingual
Access to Schools that Level the Playing Field for DC’s At-Risk Students features DC Bilingual

div.h4: Access to Schools that Level the Playing Field for DC’s At-Risk Students features DC Bilingual

div.p: Date: 10/08/19 We are excited to share that DC Policy Center’s recent report Access to Schools that Level the Playing Field for DC’s At-Risk Students features DC Bilingual as a leveler elementary school – one of only 20 elementary schools in the District. A leveler school does exceptionally well at improving academic outcomes for at-risk students. […]

a.class: vc_general vc_btn3 vc_btn3-size-md vc_btn3-shape-rounded vc_btn3-style-flat vc_btn3-color-juicy-pink
a.title: Read more
Highest Aspirations, an education podcast featuring Daniela Anello
Highest Aspirations, an education podcast featuring Daniela Anello

div.h4: Highest Aspirations, an education podcast featuring Daniela Anello

div.p: Date: 7/22/19 Highest Aspirations, an education podcast that explores the world of English language learners, featured Head of School Daniela Anello. Listen to a conversation in which Daniela describes what makes DC Bilingual successful in building competent, dual language, global citizens.
